'I Love You', Alia Bhatt's Winning Speech For Raazi Was All About Love And Ranbir Kapoor!
'I Love You', Alia Bhatt's Winning Speech For Raazi Was All About Love And Ranbir Kapoor!
Winning an award brings a big sense of validation for actors. For Alia Bhatt, 64th Filmfare awards was indeed special because she was awarded the Best Actor (Female) for Raazi.
Instagram
After receiving the award, Alia thanked her team of Raazi but a special mentioned was saved for her boyfriend Ranbir Kapoor.
In a first, Alia gave a special mention to her boyfriend and Brahmastra co-star Ranbir Kapoor at the 64th Filmfare Awards on Saturday. Calling him a ‘special man’ in her speech she went on to say,

“Meghna for me Raazi is you, your blood and sweat. You are my main chick. Vicky without you, the film wouldn’t be complete. Thank you my mentor Karan for being my mentor, father and my fashion police. Tonight’s all about love there my special one, I love you (Ranbir Kapoor).”
While Alia was gushing, Ranbir was caught on camera, blushing and exchanging smiles with Alia. See the video right here.
The duo will next be seen in Brahmastra together which is all set to release in December 2018.
